title: Team Builder
body: i just started playing LoL again after awhile, just wondering, did they take team builder out or am i just missing it?

replies.body: Teambuider level'd up with Season 6 into what is now the [new champion select.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/new-champ-select.html)  You will find the new upgrades by queing for ranked or normal draft pick on Summoner's Rift.  I hope that helps clear things up, and welcome back to League!
